name: Ramesh Kumar
quote: The water conservation training transformed my farm. My crop yields increased by 40% and I no longer worry about droughts.

name: Savita Devi
quote: Through the livestock programme, our women's group now runs a successful dairy cooperative serving 150 families.

name: Prakash Yadav
quote: The skills training gave me confidence to start my own organic farming business. Today I employ 12 people from my village.
